name: 2D Pong recreation
description:
Player 1: 
 'w'key to go up 
's'key to go down

 Player 2:
'up arrow'key to jump
'down arrow'key to go down

 

Bow.Pixel. (Mar 04, 2023). Cat 50+ animations[image]. itch.io. from https://bowpixel.itch.io/cat-50-animations

yarn ball. (2018). Pixelartmaker. from http://pixelartmaker.com/art/9c204a322f5d002

ansimuz. (March 3, 2015). Mountain at Dusk Background. OpenGameArt.Org. from https://opengameart.org/content/mountain-at-dusk-background

qubodup. (August 18, 2009). 4 dry snow steps [Audio]. OpenGameArt.Org. from https://opengameart.org/content/4-dry-snow-steps

Angry cartoon kitty meow. (n, d). mixkit. from https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/cat/

Sweet kitty meow. (n, d). mixkit. from https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/cat/

josepharaoh99. (October 13, 2016). Catsong [Audio]. OpenGameArt.Org. from https://opengameart.org/content/catsong

Dai420. (Jul 02, 2021). Living Room (16x16 Tileset)[image]. Itch.io. from https://dai420.itch.io/living-room
